sections.title: Construct a Holistic Money Strategy
sections.subtitle: Document goals, cash flow, and priorities in one actionable financial plan

sections.title: What You'll Build
items: Personal balance sheet capturing assets and liabilities
Cash-flow forecast with discretionary spending targets
Goal hierarchy ranked by urgency and impact
Action tracker assigning owners, deadlines, and metrics

sections.title: Start With Your Baseline
sections.content: List every account, property, and debt to understand your net worth today. Combine that with a realistic monthly cash-flow statement—income in, expenses out—so you can see resources available for goals.

points.title: SMART Goals
points.description: Specific, Measurable, Achievable, Relevant, Time-bound—clarity fuels progress.

points.title: Safety Margin
points.description: Build a buffer by earmarking 10-20% of cash flow for unexpected needs before investing aggressively.

points.title: Review Cadence
points.description: Monthly budget check-ins and quarterly goal assessments keep the plan current.

sections.title: Focus on One Big Win per Quarter
sections.content: Whether it's paying off a high-interest card or maxing an IRA, concentrating effort prevents overwhelm and builds momentum.

sections.title: Plan Drafting Workshop
steps: Compile your latest statements and create a personal balance sheet.
Categorize expenses into needs, wants, and savings to expose optimization opportunities.
Rank top three financial goals and assign dollar targets and timelines.
Map monthly cash allocations that support each goal.
Set calendar reminders for plan reviews and accountability check-ins.

sections.title: Automate for Consistency
sections.content: Once allocations are set, automate transfers on payday. Automation removes the friction of manual decisions.
